attributes.action: stop the buying and reselling of car practical driving tests.
attributes.additional_details: its actually ridiculous that the waiting time for a practical test is 6 months. You either remove the expiry date from our theory test certificates or you ban the reselling of practical driving tests. Buying a test for £250 is absurd.
attributes.background: Stop people from buying and reselling practical tests at a higher price. make it so that you need a theory test to be able to book a practical test as apposed to just letting anyone book one.

rejection.details:
Address the delays in getting appointments for Driving Tests: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644485

Extend the driving theory test expiry time from two to three years:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640133
